name: Nose of a Thousand Winds
description:
It's Schnoz Time! :D

You play as Schnoz Swanson, a friendly little anthropomorphic nose who needs to explore and fill out his collection!

Climb, bounce, and sneeze your way through open-ended levels! Explore peaks far above the clouds and a virus infested country town. 

Use your allergens to your advantage to traverse the world by the propulsion of your own sneezes.  

Controls:
WASD/Left Stick: Walk
Space/A/Cross: Sneeze early (character becomes all red, or meter is filled up)
R/Y/Triangle: (Hold) Restart if you become stuck. 
Sneezing propels you away from the direction you are looking with the camera.
